long_description: Want to dress up without sacrificing comfort? The Born Aleksi boots pair famously supportive Born soles with shearling-lined, full-grain leather uppers for a dose of luxury. Leather uppers offer flexible, durable support and structure; back zipper allows easy on/off. Shearling linings provide breathable warmth. EVA insoles deliver cushioning; steel shanks add excellent support for long days of standing or walking. Born Aleksi boots feature a 2 in. heel; rubber outsoles provide reliable traction. Closeout.
short_description: Want to dress up without sacrificing comfort? The Born Aleksi boots pair famously supportive Born soles with shearling-lined, full-grain leather uppers for a dose of luxury.
